attributes.additional_details:
At a time when public sector workers have been subjected to years of pay freezes.

At a time when public sector pensions have been drastically reformed.

At a time when the vast majority of people have been affected by benefit cuts including the bedroom tax.

Our leaders, the ones some people voted in to make the right decisions, have decided it is right and proper at this time of austerity to award themselves an 11% pay rise.

We all need to stand up and make it loud and clear to Cameron and Clegg 'WE ARE ALL IN THIS TOGETHER!!! So do the decent thing, do not hurt or insult us any longer and scrap your 11% increase.
